dialogue.String: 1�Her friend, Karla, was called away to stay with family in the village of Lahnefeld, on the outskirts of Bastok.
1�The caravan Karla was traveling with was set upon by a Quadav raiding party, and no one has seen her since.I don't have the heart to tell Aileen...
1�Where are you, Karla?Don't tell me she's forgotten...
1�Karla! Where have you...?
1�Oh, I'm sorry. I thought you were someone else...
1�Have you come to tell me it's time to go home, as well?
1�Well, I'm staying right here.Karla said she would come.
1�It's my birthday, you see. She said she had a present for me!
1�<Sigh>...I do hope she shows up soon.

1�The Mog Safe is where I keep items that you can't carry! It's an especially secure and solid safe, kupo!
1�You can only put so many items in it, kupo... But I'll guard them even if it means my life, kupo!
1�Storage space becomes available when you place furniture in your Mog House using the ��Layout�� command, kupo!
1�It's almost exactly the same as using your Mog Safe, kupo!Leave your items here for me to look after, kupo!
1�The Delivery Box is where you can send letters to friends and receive items from various places, kupo!
1�You should take the items from your Delivery Box and put them in your inventory when they arrive, kupo!
1�If your Delivery Box is full, no more deliveries can be made, and you can't send any mail either, kupo!
1�You can send items and gil to your friends with the ��Send�� command, kupo!
1�(Sometimes, if a special force takes hold, you can even deliver items with the "Exclusive" attribute, kupo...!)
1�Changing people's jobs is a secret ability only we moogles can use, kupo!
1�And...the rest is a secret, kupo!
1�All moogles like taking care of plants, kupo!
1�As long as you have a flowerpot and seeds, I'll make it my personal responsibility to look after the plants you raise, kupo!
1�This Mog House is your very own room, kupo! But it's still a little bare, kupo...
1�It needs some furniture and maybe some paintings to make it more cozy, kupo!
1�If you find any during your travels, I'll help you lay them out, kupo! I can't wait, kupo!
1�Each item of furniture you place using the ��Layout�� command corresponds to a different element, kupo! The type of energy that envelops your Mog House changes depending on those elements, kupo!
1�When that energy changes, my powers change as well, kupo! Master, you should try placing all sorts of furniture in your Mog House, kupo!
1�You can invite party and alliance members into your Mog House, kupo!
1�You can show off your expensive furniture, have tea parties, plan your next great adventure--the possibilities are endless, kupo!
1�Are you sure, kupo? You know everything about your Mog House, kupo?

1�If you ever run into any problems, just ask your fellow adventurers for help!

1�If you type ��/ae�� followed by your issue or question, other adventurers will help you!

1�Press it and the ��Mog House�� menu will appear! Everything you can do in your Mog House is there, kupo!
1�There are lots of things you can do in your Mog House, kupo! It can be too much for some masters, kupo...
1�Okay, kupo!Good luck on your adventuring, kupo!
1�Master!I traveled all the way here at your bidding, kupo! Even a Rent-a-Room needs a moogle, kupo!
